snippet: Cablevision, which is in the midst of an aggressive investment phase, announced a 45 percent drop in net income for the first quarter of the year.
abstract: Cablevision, which is in the midst of an aggressive investment phase, reports first-quarter profit of $57.3 million, or 21 cents a share, down 45 percent from $104 million, or 36 cents a share, in the year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: Cablevision, which is in the midst of an aggressive investment phase, announced a 45 percent drop in net income for the first quarter of the year.

headline.seo: Cablevision’s Quarterly Net Income Drops 45 Percent
headline.main: In a Time of Change and Investment at Cablevision, Its Net Income Plunges
headline.print_headline: In a Time of Change and Investment at Cablevision, Its Net Income Plunges
